issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.2 (foreground color: #404040, background color: #55acee, font size: 10.0pt (13.3333px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.2 (foreground color: #404040, background color: #55acee, font size: 10.0pt (13.3333px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.21:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #3b3b3b.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.21:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #3b3b3b.
original_issue.selector: html > body > main > section > div > article > div:nth-child(12) > button:nth-child(1)

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 4.49 (foreground color: #7c4dff, background color: #f7f7f7, font size: 9.8pt (13px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

issues.title: Aside should not be contained in another landmark
issues.description: Ensure the complementary landmark or aside is at top level

any.message: The null landmark is contained in another landmark.

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The null landmark is contained in another landmark.

automatic.name: Headings; Wrong Order, Empty & Missing Headings;

issues.title: Page should contain a level-one heading
issues.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading

all.message: Page must have a level-one heading

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Page must have a level-one heading
